Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got the camera for my son for Christmas.The pic is extreemly fuzzy in any light and after having it on for less than an hour total it quit working.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Camera does not have a flash.  Pictures are very hard to see unless you take them in bright sunlight.  No batteries or SM card comes with the camera so expect to put out another $20.  Bought them for my grands, they were very disappointed in the picture taking.

Reviews.Title: This is the worst electronics product I have ever purchased.
Reviews.Author: water "~~w~~"
Reviews.Content: It simply does not work.  The instructions do not match the device and even contradict themselves from page to page.  The screen turns on and the increase zoom function works.  Nothing else works as far as I can tell (including decrease zoom).  The mode button changes from video to pictures to viewing, but neither capturing video nor taking pictures works.  When I first start the devise, the screen displays a message stating there is an error with the card, asking if I want to format it (yes) or not (no).  There is no way to choose either selection.  Hitting the mode button is the only thing that does anything, but as noted above, the modes do not work.

Reviews.Title: Fake Product in Empty Case
Reviews.Author: Drake
Reviews.Content: Bought this product and it is fake.  Just an empty plastic case without anything inside.  It was in sealed original packaging, and they will not take back because it is opened.  It has no connectors for the battery, and it is just an empty plastic shell.  Nothing to take video.  AVOID BUYING.Curtis VR223-Black Digital Camera/Camcorder with 2-Inch Screen 4X Zoom (Black)

Reviews.Title: P.O.S.
Reviews.Author: Dena Scott
Reviews.Content: This camera is a P.O.S.  Do not waste your time or money.  Got this camera as a gift for my child and it would not even turn on!

ProductInfo.Features:
Mini digital camcorder with 2" LCD screen and 1.3MP CMOS sensor with 4x digital zoom
Convenient integrated USB 2.0 hi-speed plug for fast file transfers.
Up to 8GB memory with optional SD/SDHC card, edit video and upload to YouTube.
Video resolution; VGA (640 x 480) @ 30fps, AV file (Motion JPEG codec)
Take still pictures or videos
ProductInfo.Name: Curtis VR223-Black Digital Camera/Camcorder with 2-Inch Screen 4X Zoom (Black)
